item.title: 4. Communicating
item.author: shawn.graham@carleton.ca (Dr. Shawn Graham)
item.description: To Be Completed by June 18th Watch Sometimes the embed seems to not load, at least for me. If that happens to you, just watch it on youtube. (My speaking notes for the video) DH Exploration Exercise Remember back in Part one, how I had you explore that twitter thread by Amalia Skarlatou Levi? In this final segment, you’ll be selecting one of those resources she shared (or, if none strike your fancy, something from the resources gathered here, or from the list of Ottawa Datasets at the bottom of the page) to do some exploratory digital history.
